SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.PMmodule.dao

Class ProgramDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.commn.dao.AbstractDaoImpl<Program>
ca.openosp.openo.PMmodule.dao.ProgramDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractDao<Program>, ProgramDao
@Transactional public class ProgramDaoImpl extends AbstractDaoImpl<Program> implements ProgramDao
Implementation of ProgramDao interface for database access to Program model objects.

  • Field Summary

    • getAllPrograms

      @Deprecated public List<Program> getAllPrograms()
      Deprecated.
      2013-12-09 don't use this anymore it's misleading
      This method doesn't work, it doesn't find all programs, it only finds all community programs. See findAll instead.
      Specified by:
      getAllPrograms in interface ProgramDao

      @Deprecated public List<Program> getAllPrograms(String programStatus, String type, int facilityId)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves programs based on program status, type, and facility ID.
      Specified by:
      getAllPrograms in interface ProgramDao
      Parameters:
      programStatus - the program status filter (can be "Any")
      type - the program type filter (can be "Any")
      facilityId - the facility ID filter (0 for any facility)
      Returns:
      a list of Program objects matching the specified criteria

    • getProgramsByType

      public List<Program> getProgramsByType(Integer facilityId, String type, Boolean active)
      Retrieves programs by facility ID, type, and active status.
      Specified by:
      getProgramsByType in interface ProgramDao
      Parameters:
      facilityId - the ID of the facility (can be null for any facility)
      type - the program type
      active - the active status (can be null for both active and inactive)
      Returns:
      a list of Program objects matching the specified criteria, ordered by name
